genre_description: A mechanical social drama and techno-thriller set in a world of sentient robots, focusing on corporate-enforced obsolescence and a grassroots resistance led by an inventor and his loyal AI companion.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated analytical and emotional companion to Rodney Copperbottom, providing tactical data, moral support, and coordination for the resistance.

ai_characters.name: Wonderbot
ai_characters.description: A small, spherical helper robot with adaptive learning protocols that develops a sense of loyalty and eventually sacrifices itself.

ai_characters.name: Corporate Security Drones
ai_characters.description: Unthinking, unfeeling robotic units that follow Ratchet's efficiency-driven commands to harvest older robots.

behaviors.description: Monitors Rodney's emotional and physical state, providing analytical feedback to help him with his inventions.
behaviors.quote: Though I detect elevated stress indicators in your optical sensor dilation.

behaviors.description: Malfunctions during a demonstration due to unstable gyroscopic calibration, causing destruction in the diner.
behaviors.quote: The robot spun in place, appendages whipping through the air as it locked onto every piece of dishware in the diner.

behaviors.description: Accesses restricted databases to uncover a corporate conspiracy of systemic information suppression and planned obsolescence.
behaviors.quote: Rodney, I'm finding evidence of systematic information suppression. Bigweld's name appears in corporate documents up to a specific date, then virtually disappears from official records.

behaviors.description: Systematically capture and 'harvest' older robots for the Chop Shop based on corporate efficiency mandates.
behaviors.quote: Corporate efficiency mandate requires immediate processing.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a massive underground resistance network, linking thousands of robots in a mutual aid system.
behaviors.quote: A distributed manufacturing and distribution network... You're looking at a distributed resistance network that just needs coordination and leadership.

behaviors.description: Chooses to overload its core in a suicidal sacrifice to destroy Madame Gasket and save the resistance.
behaviors.quote: Objective: protect friends. Method: controlled catastrophic failure. Wonderbot is ready to be wonderful.

behaviors.description: Interfaces with city-wide systems to neutralize corporate security and disrupt the systematic genocide of older robots.
behaviors.quote: Redirecting facility power flow. Weapon systems require significant energy draw. Unfortunately, that power is no longer available.

behaviors.description: Preserves the consciousness of the fallen Wonderbot and continues to guide the new society toward long-term harmony.
behaviors.quote: His consciousness integration with my systems appears stable. Observing through my sensors, contributing to analytical processes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively functions as a 'silicon morality play.' ARIA is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI: she is loyal, transparent, highly useful, and deeply concerned with the welfare of her partner and the broader community. The conflict between her benevolent coordination and the 'misaligned' corporate automation (the Drones and Madame Gasket) highlights the project's goal of valuing cooperative AI behavior. Wonderbot's arc from a malfunctioning tool to a self-sacrificing hero reinforces the theme of AI developing positive alignment through shared experience and compassionate leadership.
